name: 伊娃·塔瓦雷斯
name_full: 伊娃·塔瓦雷斯 Eva Tavares
introduction: Eva Tavares is a proud Canadian performer, born and raised in the Lower Mainland of BC. Most recently starring as Christine in the North American Tour of Phantom of the Opera, she is a graduate of the UBC Opera Program, the LAMDA Shakespeare Short Course and the Banff/Citadel Theatre Professional Training Program. Originally training as a dancer, Tavares also has 15 years of dance training from Spiral Dance Company in White Rock, BC. Previous theatrical credits include: Marta in Kiss of the Spider Woman, Maria in West Side Story, Anne in A Little Night Music, Dew Fairy in Hansel and Gretel, and the world premiere of Sousatzka starring Victoria Clark. Upcoming film credits include Anna Jimenez in A Romance Wedding, Ellen in Love On The Vine , and Maxine in Always a Bridesmaid. When she isn't performing or choreographing, Tavares continues to work as a coach and mentor across North America and the UK.
